data.text: @billritter7 @bethshaevitz My condolences to you and your family. I 🙏 pray for strength and ✌ peace in you time of grief.
@billritter7 @bethshaevitz I’m so sorry for your loss.

@billritter7 @bethshaevitz @billritter7 your incredible level of empathy and passion never ceases to amaze me. My condolences on the loss of your brother Bruce and @bethshaevitz sorry for the loss of your dad. May the both of you come together in each other’s search for peace. ❤️M
@billritter7 @bethshaevitz May he safely rest in peace in the arms of our dear Lord.

@billritter7 @bethshaevitz Daddy died 34 yrs ago, cousin 33, other cousin 32, other cousin like 15 years later. Valentines day be like grandma died, herbie died cousin Charles bday. Fucking Covid kilt 1 person you at a loss? People die everyday B !!! Ijs
@billritter7 @bethshaevitz As someone who buried 2 brothers far too young, I can relate to the pain of your loss.  I wish you peace.
@billritter7 @bethshaevitz So sorry for your loss.  May he rest in peace! 🙏🙏
